svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0" version="8.0.9" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="89f1ebe4-1999-7b1e-27ea-d37cdd941e19" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 58px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 92px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 48px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 122px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 36px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 508px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: The 12V battery system is only to be used if there are indeed enough 12V appliances in the house to justify its implementation

switch.text: The 12V battery system is only to be used if there are indeed enough 12V appliances in the house to justify its implementation

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 508px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: The battery charger will charge the 12V battery when the battery's SOC level is below 95%, and stop charging when a SOC level of 95% has been reached

switch.text: The battery charger will charge the 12V battery when the battery's SOC level is below 95%, and stop charging when a SOC level of 95% has been reached

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div:
The PCB switch is the arduino-controlled mains on/off relay.
It will allow power to pass when off-peak hours are in effect.
This arduino-controlled mains on/off relay is optional.
